SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'ES' AND city = 'Barcelona' AND bar = 1 AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'IT' AND city IN ('Sicily') AND beach_access IN ('private beach', 'beach access') AND restaurant = 1;

SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'GR' AND (city = 'Crete' OR city = 'Rhodes') AND (kids_friendly_buffet = 1 AND playground = 1 AND (bike_rentals = 1 OR ev_charging_station = 1)) AND (unit_wheelchair_accessible = 1 OR increased_accessibility = 1) AND (pool = 1 OR water_park = 1);
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Copenhagen' AND pet_friendly IN ('pets allowed on request') AND cribs = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'NO' AND city = 'Oslo' AND ocean_view = 1 AND parking = 'free';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'SE' AND (playground = 1 OR (aircondition = 1 AND pool = 1));
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'SE' AND city = 'Stockholm' AND adults_only = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country IN ('DK', 'SE') AND wifi = 'free' AND bar = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'NO' AND city = 'Oslo' AND restaurant = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND pet_friendly = 'no';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Copenhagen' AND spa = 1 AND bar = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'NO' AND city = 'Oslo' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND (parking = 'free' OR parking = 'surcharge');
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'SE' AND city = 'Stockholm' AND increased_accessibility = 1 AND (spa = 1 OR ocean_view = 1);
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'SE' AND city = 'Stockholm' AND wifi = 'free';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Copenhagen' AND increased_accessibility = 1 AND unit_wheelchair_accessible = 1 AND kids_friendly_buffet = 0 AND child_pool = 0 AND playground = 0;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Bergen' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed on request' AND (ocean_view = 1 OR mountains_view = 1) AND bar = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Aarhus' AND rating > 7 AND bar = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'NO' AND city = 'Oslo' AND stars = 5 AND rating > 8;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'SE' AND city = 'Stockholm' AND pet_friendly = 'pets allowed' AND ev_charging_station = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'DE' AND city = 'Berlin' AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'FR' AND city = 'Paris' AND spa = 1 AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'IT' AND city = 'Rome' AND adults_only = 0 AND (fitness_center = 1 OR spa = 1 OR pool = 1 OR increased_accessibility = 1) AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'GR' AND city = 'Corfu' AND pool = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE city = 'Eindhoven' AND wifi = 'free' AND (spa = 1 OR fitness_center = 1);
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'IT' AND city = 'Venice' AND stars >= 4.5 AND gym = 1 AND spa = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'ES' AND city = 'Madrid' AND fitness_center = 1 AND stars <= 3;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'FR' AND city = 'Paris' AND spa = 1 AND wifi = 'free';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'HU' AND fitness_center = 1 AND bar = 1 AND kids_friendly_buffet = 0 AND child_pool = 0 AND pet_friendly = 'no pets';
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'GB' AND city = 'London' AND (parking = 'free' OR parking = 'surgarge') AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'AT' AND spa = 1 AND (aircondition = 1 AND unit_wheelchair_accessible = 1 AND increased_accessibility = 1) AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'NL' AND spa = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'CZ' AND city = 'Prague' AND spa = 1 AND restaurant = 1 AND (kids_friendly_buffet = 1 OR playground = 1);
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'IT' AND city = 'Rome' AND spa = 1 AND (sauna = 1 OR steam_room = 1) AND restaurant = 1 AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'PT' AND city = 'Porto' AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1 AND kids_friendly_buffet = 0 AND child_pool = 0 AND playground = 0;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'ES' AND city = 'Barcelona' AND restaurant = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1 AND beach_access IN ('private beach', 'beach access');
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'IT' AND city = 'Rome' AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'TR' AND city = 'Istanbul' AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1 AND stars = 5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'NL' AND city = 'Amsterdam' AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'ES' AND city = 'Madrid' AND spa = 1 AND wifi = 'free' AND pool = 1 AND kids_friendly_pool = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'FR' AND city = 'Paris' AND (description LIKE '%spa%' OR amenities LIKE '%spa%') AND spa = 1 AND fitness_center = 1 AND restaurant = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'DK' AND city = 'Copenhagen' AND increased_accessibility = 1 AND restaurant = 1 AND fitness_center = 1;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'AT' AND city = 'Vienna' AND stars = 5 AND fitness_center = 1 AND spa = 1 AND restaurant = 1 AND rating >= 9 AND review_count >= 50;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE country = 'GR' AND city = 'Corfu' AND adults_only = 1 AND (description LIKE '%view%' OR description LIKE '%scenic%') AND spa = 1;
